content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input_str::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_str, ' ')
    result = IOBuffer()
    
    current_line_length = 0
    for word in words
        if current_line_length + length(word) > text_width
            println(result, "")
            current_line_length = 0
        else
            print(result, " ", word)
            current_line_length += length(word) + 1
        end
    end
    return String(take!(result))
end

# Example usage:
input_str = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc eget."
println(wrap_string(input_str))
```
